entry.title: Hamas Took More Than 200 Hostages From Israel. Here's What to Know.
entry.content: Militants from the Gaza Strip abducted civilians and soldiers in the attack on Israel.

entry.title: Israeli Army Expands Ground Operations, U.S. Pushes for Pause
entry.content: The Israeli army said it was expanding its ground operations in the Gaza Strip in its largest operation yet ahead of an invasion intended to end 16 years of Hamas rule, while the strip came under a nearly complete communications blackout.

entry.title: Maine Manhunt Enters Third Day as Authorities Search River
entry.content: The suspect, Robert Card, remains at large after 18 people were killed in Lewiston.
